name: Pulled Pork Nachos with Sriracha Slaw
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Step up your nacho game this game day by turning leftover pulled pork into a sheet-full of goodness no one will be able to resist. Garnish with pickled jalapeno slices, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package classic coleslaw mix (such as Dole®)
½ small red onion, thinly sliced
directions: Combine water, vinegar, sriracha, sugar, oregano, and salt in a saucepan and bring to a boil
Turn off heat, stir, and let cool for 10 minutes
Combine coleslaw and onion in a large bowl
Pour sriracha mixture on top, stir, and set aside while you prepare nachos
Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler on low setting, if available
Spread tortilla chips on a baking sheet and scatter pulled pork on top
Broil nachos in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 6 minutes
